#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define ull long long int
ull mo(ull);
ull num = 1000000007;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		ull n;
		ull x,y,w=123456791;
		cin>>n;
		x=mo(n+1)-9*n-10;
		
		y=((x*7)%num)*w;
		y=y%(num);
		cout<<y<<endl;
	}
}
ull mo(ull n)
{	ull y;
	if(n<=9)
		return pow(10,n);
	else{
		 y = mo(n/2);
		if(n%2 == 0)
			y = (y*y)%num;
		else
			y = (((y*y)%num)*10)%num;
	}
	return y;
	
}
